Tech.name: The Courts of Kudo Mura
Tech.Description: The diplomats of Kudo Mura are masters at dealing with the needs, desires, and whims of their superiors. When conversing with a samurai from one of the Great Clans or the Imperial Families, you gain +3k0 on all Contested Rolls using the skills of Etiquette or Sincerity.

Requirements.Requirement: Character must belong to a Minor Clan
